title: [feature request] Spectral norm support in torch.norm
body_html: Currently PyTorch has a spectral matrix norm implementation based on power iteration hidden inside the SpectralNorm. Since new torch.norm supports matrix norms (e.g. nuclear norm), it may be good to move it there, so it's usable in other contexts too (e.g. for debugging/tracing spectral properties of neural net weights, and since PyTorch doesn't support truncated randomized SVD yet).
